content: While searching who to blame for names I just found out we have https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/blob/master/Mathlib/Data/Prod.lean which is a version of what should be data.prod.basic. So we probably also need a script hunting down files that exist in mathlib4 but not in mathlib (outside the tactic folder of course)
There shouldn't be too many of these, we're trying to adhere to the convention that mathlib4 mimics mathlib file positioning, but I guess this predates that
But you will find a fair number of files that have almost nothing in them because most theorems that were in the file have been moved to lean4 or std4
